      ProjectPane(meico.mei.Mei mei, MpmToolbox parent)
      constructor, the MEI input is converted to MSM and MPM; if the MEI has more than one mdiv, only the first is converted to MSM and MPM; use mei.exportMsmMpm() directly and choose the desired MSM from the output to instantiate a ProgramData object.
